p:
The number of results obtained using Scopus were 87, those from Embase were 365, and those from PubMed were 64. Among those results, only research articles in English were considered for data screening. Also, duplicates were disregarded. In addition, reference lists of papers were screened to detect research papers which did not appear in the database research but might fulfill the acceptance criteria ( Figure 1). Afterwards, the papers were screened and selected if meeting the following acceptance criteria:
Original research data.
Use of essential oil containing terpenes and/or isolated terpenes in nanostructured systems or cyclodextrins.
Formulations for topical administration.
